nodes.text: A repulsorcart appeared in the 2003 Star Wars Roleplaying Game adventure Zygerrian Takedown which was released online by Wizards of the Coast and designed by Jason Fry. The adventure suggests that players could rent repulsorcarts and use them to transport a stunned courier that they need to capture, although players are free to use any method to try and subdue and move their target. A distraction for the heroes is later described involving a struggling elderly Chadra-Fan whom they can aid, although they are free to ignore her entirely.
